delete.title: Delete Category
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? You won't be able to restore it. This will also remove all its media items, groups and platforms.

reloadCatalog.title: Reload Data
reloadCatalog.message: Are you sure you want to reload the catalog data? This will overwrite any manual changes to the fields linked with the catalog.

message.VIDEOGAME: Videogame(s) with the same name were found in this category. Are you sure you want to create it anyway?
